html:
136 U.S. 581

10 S.Ct. 1062

34 L.Ed. 345

MASON et al.
v.
UNITED STATES.

May 19, 1890.

[Statement of Case from pages 581-586 intentionally omitted]

W. C. Goudy, for plaintiffs in error.

The Solicitor General, for defendant in error.

PER CURIAM.

1

The motion for leave to amend the writ of error, citation, and bond in this cause is denied, and the writ of error is dismissed.
